SUITE tokens to get credits for app usage Two user paths: 1. Crypto users: Buy SUITE on Uniswap, then stake() 2. Normie users: Use buyAndStake() with USDC Credit mechanics: - Staking gives you credits equal to staked amount - Apps deduct credits via useCredits() - Unstaking returns SUITE minus used credits (used credits are burned)","errors":{"EnforcedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is paused."}],"ExpectedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is not paused."}],"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. params.amount: Amount of bonus credits to add

params.amounts: Array of amounts for each user
params.users: Array of addresses to receive bonus credits

params.usdcAmount: Amount of USDC to spend (6 decimals)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.amount: Amount of bonus credits to redeem
params.user: Address whose bonus credits to redeem

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.amount: Amount of bonus credits to restore

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unstake(uint256).details: Used credits are burned, remaining SUITE is returned

params.amount: Amount of staked SUITE to withdraw Example: staked=100, used=30, unstake(50) - Burns min(50, 30) = 30 from used credits - Returns 50 - 30 = 20 SUITE to user - New state: staked=50, used=0

addBonusCredits(address,uint256).notice: Add bonus credits to a user (no SUITE backing, just paper credits)

addBonusCreditsBatch(address[],uint256[].notice: Add bonus credits to multiple users at once

addRewardDistributor(address).notice: Add a reward distributor (can add bonus credits)

authorizeApp(address).notice: Authorize an app to spend user credits

authorizedApps(address).notice: Apps authorized to spend user credits

availableCredits(address).notice: Get available credits for a user

bonusCredits(address).notice: Bonus credits awarded to users (rewards, no SUITE backing)

buy(uint256).notice: Buy SUITE tokens with USDC (sent to wallet, not staked)

buyAndStake(uint256).notice: Buy SUITE with USDC and automatically stake it

redeemBonusCredits(address,uint256).notice: Redeem bonus credits (called by withdrawal contract)

restoreBonusCredits(address,uint256).notice: Restore bonus credits (called by withdrawal contract on cancel)

rewardDistributors(address).notice: Addresses authorized to distribute bonus credits

setSuitePerUsdc(uint256).notice: Update the SUITE per USDC rate

setWithdrawalContract(address).notice: Set the withdrawal contract that can redeem bonus credits

stake(uint256).notice: Stake SUITE tokens to receive credits

stakedBalance(address).notice: Total SUITE staked by each user

suitePerUsdc().notice: SUITE tokens per USDC (e.g., 1000 = 1 USDC buys 1000 SUITE)

totalBonusCredits().notice: Total bonus credits in the system (for redemption calculations)

totalCredits(address).notice: Get total credits ever received (for display)

useCredits(address,uint256).notice: Deduct credits from a user (called by authorized apps)

usedCredits(address).notice: Credits consumed by each user (tracked separately, burned on unstake)

withdrawalContract().notice: Contract authorized to redeem bonus credits
